TopicTitle: Been away for some time, been playing the past few days. Have some issues.

Articles.Content:
I'm bad when it comes to the technical stuff and rely a lot on Mechjeb to get anywhere. The past few days I've been getting the popup message that it's not compatible with the recent update. Some features do still work, but it's mostly unresponsive especially for the ascent guidance which I need the most. As hard as I try I can't seem to get a well circularized orbit although every one does it so easily in all the videos I watch.

My question is, I've searched the forums and redownloaded the links provided and still have these issues with an outdated Mechjeb. How do I fix this? Thanks!

Edit: Sorry, I meant to put Mechjeb somewhere in the title.

Edited February 1, 2015 by MHI
This affair about an add-on has been moved to Add-on Affairs.

Did you delete the old version and get this one?

http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/220221-mechjeb

Did you delete the old version and get this one?

http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/220221-mechjeb

Yes, however I just realized I was placing it in the wrong folder! I have since corrected that and the message has gone away. Thank you.

Edited February 1, 2015 by MHI
